all_tasks.title: [HANDOFF] Claude Code Agent — Cross-Workspace Sync Audit & Continuation
all_tasks.description:
HANDOFF TASK FOR CLAUDE CODE AGENT 

This task transfers responsibility for code review, audit, and implementation continuation of the Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization project.

 Context: 
- Unified methodology document created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Unified Methodology
- Main project created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Implementation
- Phase 1 tasks defined for 4 core functions
- Existing related work: DriveSheetsSync v2.3, Inter-Workspace DB Sync project, Database Synchronization Workflow

 Scope of Work: 
1.  Audit  — Review existing codebase for sync-related functions in DriveSheetsSync and related scripts
2.  Gap Analysis  — Compare existing implementations against unified methodology requirements
3.  Remediation  — Identify and document code gaps, conflicts, or misalignments
4.  Implementation Plan  — Create detailed implementation steps for Phase 1 functions
5.  Handoff Return  — Prepare task handoff back to Notion AI Research Agent with findings and next steps

 Key References: 
- DriveSheetsSync Registry Sync & Compliance Alignment issue (8 linked Agent-Tasks)
- Notion Database Sync Technical Documentation
- Inter-Workspace Database Synchronization Workflow
- Requirements — Database Synchronization Workflow

 API Limitation Note: 
- Notion API v2025-09-03 does NOT expose view metadata — syncDatabaseViewsRegistryForDatabase_ is BLOCKED

 Return Handoff Requirements: 
- Summary of audit findings
- List of existing code that can be reused
- Gap analysis with specific file/function references
- Recommended implementation sequence
- Estimated effort for each Phase 1 function
- Blockers or risks identified

HANDOFF TASK FOR CLAUDE CODE AGENT 

This task transfers responsibility for code review, audit, and implementation continuation of the Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization project.

 Context: 
- Unified methodology document created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Unified Methodology
- Main project created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Implementation
- Phase 1 tasks defined for 4 core functions
- Existing related work: DriveSheetsSync v2.3, Inter-Workspace DB Sync project, Database Synchronization Workflow

 Scope of Work: 
1.  Audit  — Review existing codebase for sync-related functions in DriveSheetsSync and related scripts
2.  Gap Analysis  — Compare existing implementations against unified methodology requirements
3.  Remediation  — Identify and document code gaps, conflicts, or misalignments
4.  Implementation Plan  — Create detailed implementation steps for Phase 1 functions
5.  Handoff Return  — Prepare task handoff back to Notion AI Research Agent with findings and next steps

 Key References: 
- DriveSheetsSync Registry Sync & Compliance Alignment issue (8 linked Agent-Tasks)
- Notion Database Sync Technical Documentation
- Inter-Workspace Database Synchronization Workflow
- Requirements — Database Synchronization Workflow

 API Limitation Note: 
- Notion API v2025-09-03 does NOT expose view metadata — syncDatabaseViewsRegistryForDatabase_ is BLOCKED

 Return Handoff Requirements: 
- Summary of audit findings
- List of existing code that can be reused
- Gap analysis with specific file/function references
- Recommended implementation sequence
- Estimated effort for each Phase 1 function
- Blockers or risks identified
